Experience

Lead Designer, Security Innovation

Time spent: 2014 - Current

Worked (and working) on a number of different projects with Security Innovation, involving a refresh of existing products, services and brands. My main work thus far has been on the application TEAM Mentor, from concept, design, development and deployment. Involved client meetings, research, mock ups, story boards, user personas, user testing, prototyping, design and development.

Consultant Course Writer, QA

Time spent: 6 weeks (2014)

Worked with QA to develop a Ruby on Rails course that would be suitable for beginners with no prior knowledge of Rails. Involved research, prototyping, documentation, story boards, design and development.

Intern, JosephMark

Time spent: 1 month (2013)

Offered a one-month internship with Brisbane's best product design agency, JosephMark. Worked on a small web application for a Queensland University, designed to collect data from participants in a survey. Involved client meetings, concept creation, research, wireframing, design and development.

Consultant, Self-Employed

Time spent: 2 years (2010-2012)

Worked with a variety of clients - from small businesses successfully launching first websites, to helping existing companies improve their brand. Involved client meetings, research, prototyping, user testing, design and development.

Intern, ae creative

Time spent: 6 months (2010)

Worked on a number of different freelance projects for small businesses, specifically web design and using the platform Wordpress. Involved client meetings, basic concepts, research, design and development.
